divs: Sighting DetailsOk there was a mysterious object UFO which started the anti-aircraft artilery off at aprox 3AM. Now the pciture that is shown like on the History Channel on May 26, 2010 is very bright and blurry. I have a copy of the picture I have enclosed for you to see. Now you will notice you can barley make out the subject with the bright spotting lights are beamed on. Now I took the picture and used a program on my laptop and did some adjusting of tint, hue, saturation and shadows and was able to pull a image out and I will leave it to you to see what you see and tell me its not what we all think? Very interesting and the photos are are doctored and are still on my Laptop and can show how the image was pulled out to what you see. I have enclosed untouch picture and the one I did and you can see what you see. You are free to contact me anytime for any questions, but lets look into this because this shows once again the Government is pushing aside and hiding..............
